caption: Just propagated my monstera! 🌿
description: Tried water propagation for the first time and it’s already showing roots! Any tips for transitioning to soil?

caption: Fern vibes on a rainy day ☔
description: My Boston fern has got too much watered today. pray for her!.

caption: My succulent family is growing! 🪴✨
description: Added 4 new succulents to my collection. I’m obsessed with how low-maintenance they are!

caption: Cactus bloom season 🌵💚
description: First time seeing my cactus bloom in over a year. Nature really be healing 💫

caption: Alocasia leaf flex 🐘💚
description: Just wiped down the massive leaves and I swear it’s glowing now. Alocasia supremacy 🫡

caption: Philodendron princess is thriving 👑
description: Low light, minimal water, and she still slays. Might chop & prop soon!

caption: Pothos vines hitting new lengths 🪴🧵
description: These vines are wild. Thinking of hanging them from my ceiling next.

caption: Bonsai trimming day 🪴✂️
description: Zen mode activated. Took 30 minutes but she’s now perfectly shaped. 🌳

caption: ZZ plant needs no drama 😎🌿
description: Legit forgot to water for two weeks and it still looks like I just bought it. Underrated king.

caption: Snake plant Sundays 🐍🌱
description: Did some light repotting + wiped down leaves. This plant is a chill, clean vibe machine.

caption: String of Pearls is vibin' 💎🌱
description: Finally nailed the watering schedule. It’s no longer dying dramatically every week.

caption: Peace Lily blooming again! ✨
description: Gave her indirect sunlight and a pep talk, and boom – flowers.

caption: Caladium chaos 🩷💚
description: These pink leaves are giving flamingo-core. Instant serotonin.

caption: My ivy is outta control 🍃😅
description: Had to cut back like 3 feet today. Thinking of turning it into a jungle curtain.

caption: FLF finally settled in 🎻🪴
description: Moved it to a brighter corner and now she’s growing strong. Took 3 weeks of stress tho 🫠

caption: Air plant goals ✨🌬️
description: No soil. No stress. Just a cute lil dude floating on my bookshelf.

caption: Oxalis opened like a butterfly 🦋
description: Love how it folds at night and stretches in the morning. Nature’s drama queen.

caption: Dragon tree hitting its final form 🐉🌿
description: Looks like a medieval plant wizard now. Should I name it?

caption: Rubber plant is so glossy rn 💅🌱
description: Leaf shine + water = ✨ glow up. Might model it for a skincare ad next tbh.

caption: Prayer plant always moving 🙏🌿
description: It’s literally like a slow dance in leaf form. Catches light. Changes shape. I’m obsessed.
